title.narrative: Strenthening Border and Migration Management in Ghana

description.narrative: The overall objective of the development cooperation among the parties is to support the Government of Ghana (GoG) in strengthening their institutional and operational capacities to manage irregular migration flows.

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

title.narrative: Improved effectiveness of document check by usage of modern equipment at basic intermediate and advanced level.
Improved effectiveness of document check by usage of modern equipment at basic intermediate and advanced level.

Increased capacity of GIS to provide trainings on document security using modern methodological skills and techniques, to detect forged or falsified document, to improve profiling and detect impostor /identity theft.

description.narrative: Training and equipment gabs and need assessment of the GIS have been undertaken and provided the basis for capacity building activities. - three trainings (87 participants) have been trained in basic document security (Doc. 1). Resulted in certificatoin of 50 officers. - one training (10 participants) have been trained in intermediate document security (Doc. 2). Resulted in certification of 10 officers. - training materials have been developed and the first steps taken to establish an intra-agency information exchange mechanism on information security.
